availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry N. Newman (Pendleton County, Kentucky, merchant)

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, merchant. Kenton County, Kentucky, native. Married to Catharine Magill Newman in Pendleton County, Kentucky, on January 7, 1859. Father of John M. Newman. Merchant in Pendleton County in 1860. Postmaster of Falmouth, Kentucky in 1865.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, Falmouth, p. 430.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Pendleton County Marriages, Film 000272800, p. 13.
U.S., Register of Officers and Agents, Civil, Military, and Naval, in the Service of the United States, on the Thirtieth September, 1865(Washington: Government Printing Office, 1866), 118.
